short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A browser extension that adds a “Play All” button in the “Videos”, “Shorts”, and “Live” tabs of a YouTube channel.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The extension creates the ability to binge-watch a channel’s content in a single click. The added button will play all a channel’s videos, shorts, or live streams one after another automatically. 

The order of the content is sorted through the selected tab, either by "latest" or "popular" (descending order). YouTube does not have a feature for sorting by "oldest", so it is not supported.

The button waits for all other content to finish loading before it appears (this should take maximum 1-2 seconds).
